scripts.build:lowmem: pnpm run build:clean && cross-env LOW_MEMORY_BUILD=true NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 UV_THREADPOOL_SIZE=2 NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192 --max-semi-space-size=128" NODE_ENV=production node scripts/run-next-build.cjs
scripts.dev:clean: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Get-Process | Where-Object { $_.ProcessName -like '*node*' } | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Sleep -Seconds 1; Remove-Item -Path ./.next -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $env:NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=8192'; pnpm dev"
scripts.build:secure: pnpm run security-check && pnpm run build
scripts.analyze: cross-env ANALYZE=true NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=10240 --max-semi-space-size=512" NODE_ENV=production next build
scripts.test:build: pnpm run lint && pnpm run type-check && pnpm run build
scripts.security-check: echo 'Checking admin security...' && grep -q 'Disallow: /admin' public/robots.txt && echo 'Admin protection verified' || echo 'WARNING: Admin not protected in robots.txt'
scripts.deploy:secure: pnpm run security-check && pnpm run build && echo 'Ready for deployment with admin protection'
scripts.deploy:rescrape: pnpm run deploy && sleep 60 && pnpm run rescrape
scripts.build:analyze: cross-env ANALYZE=true NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=10240 --max-semi-space-size=512" UV_THREADPOOL_SIZE=8 next build
scripts.production: pnpm run build && pnpm run start:production
scripts.probe: powershell -Command "& { $start = Get-Date; try { $response = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'https://www.chiangmaiusedcar.com/' -UserAgent 'Chrome-Lighthouse' -UseBasicParsing -TimeoutSec 30; $end = Get-Date; $total = ($end - $start).TotalSeconds; Write-Host ('TTFB:N/A Total:' + $total + 's Status:' + $response.StatusCode) } catch { Write-Host 'Error: Connection failed' } }"
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: sentry-cli sourcemaps inject ./out && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org ครูหนึ่งรถสวย --project nextjs ./out
scripts.optimize:images: node -e "console.log('Image optimization requires sharp package. Please resize images manually using online tools like squoosh.app')"
